verses.name: Haggai 2:7
verses.text: And I will shake all nations, and the desire of all nations shall come: and I will fill this house with glory, saith the Lord of hosts.

verses.name: Haggai 2:8
verses.text: The silver is mine, and the gold is mine, saith the Lord of hosts.

verses.name: Haggai 2:9
verses.text: The glory of this latter house shall be greater than of the former, saith the Lord of hosts: and in this place will I give peace, saith the Lord of hosts.

verses.name: Haggai 2:10
verses.text: In the four and twentieth day of the ninth month, in the second year of Darius, came the word of the Lord by Haggai the prophet, saying,
